column5: The story of young girl Scout Finch and her father Atticus Finch who defends a black man accused of raping a white woman in 1930s Alabama.
A dystopian novel set in a totalitarian society where the government uses surveillance and mind control to maintain power.
The classic tale of love manners and marriage revolving around the Bennet family and their five daughters.
A story of the American Dream love and decadence set in the Roaring Twenties.
The adventures of Bilbo Baggins a hobbit who embarks on a journey to help a group of dwarves reclaim their homeland.
The novel explores the lives of the Ramsay family and their guests during visits to the Isle of Skye in Scotland.
A dystopian novel set in a future society where citizens are engineered and conditioned for a predetermined social order.

column1: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
column5: The first book in the Harry Potter series following young wizard Harry Potter as he discovers his magical heritage.
Set in a future society where books are banned and 'firemen' burn any that are found.
The story of Jane Eyre an orphan who becomes a governess and falls in love with her employer Mr. Rochester.
The story of Holden Caulfield a teenager struggling with identity teenage angst and alienation.

column1: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
column5: The first book in the Lord of the Rings trilogy following the quest to destroy the One Ring.
The story of Captain Ahab's obsessive quest to hunt and kill the white whale Moby-Dick.
The story of the four March sisters and their journey to adulthood during the Civil War era.
An epic poem telling the story of Odysseus' journey home after the fall of Troy.
The story of a young man who remains young and beautiful while his portrait ages and bears the scars of his sins.
An allegorical novella portraying events leading up to the Russian Revolution and the early years of the Soviet Union.
The tale of a girl named Alice who falls through a rabbit hole into a fantasy world populated by peculiar creatures.
The story of a shepherd boy named Santiago who sets out on a journey to find a hidden treasure in Egypt.
A powerful tale of the Joad family's migration from the Oklahoma Dust Bowl to California during the Great Depression.
